operation_mode.label: Operation Mode
operation_mode.comment: If the test mode is selected the test account is used. Otherwise the configured account is used.

paybox_hmac_key.label: Live HMAC Key
paybox_hmac_key.comment: The HMAC key as defined in the live backoffice of Paybox. You may need generate the HMAC key. Please take a look at the manual how to do this.

paybox_rang.label: Live Rang (PBX_RANG)
paybox_rang.comment: The rang (PBX_RANG) as defined in the live backoffice of Paybox. It must be nummeric value with length two. In the backoffice it may be displayed as a three char value. You must truncate the first digit.

paybox_site.label: Live Site ID (PBX_SITE)
paybox_site.comment: The site id (PBX_RANG) as defined in the backoffice of Paybox.

paybox_identifier.label: Live Identifier (PBX_IDENTIFIANT)
paybox_identifier.comment: The identifier as defined in the backoffice of Paybox.

paybox_shop_password.label: Live Password
paybox_shop_password.comment: This password is used for recurring payments and for the alias manager as well as for the server authorization. This is the password of the Paybox account.

order_id_schema.label: Order Prefix
order_id_schema.comment: Here you can insert an order prefix. The prefix allows you to change the order number that is transmitted to Authorize.net. The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name_{id}).

transaction_updates.label: Transaction Updates
transaction_updates.comment: When the store is not available (network outage, server failure or any other outage), when the feedback of Paybox is sent, then the transaction state is not updated. Hence no order confirmation e-mail is sent and the order is not in the paid state. By activating the transaction update, such transactions can be authorized later over direct link. To use this feature the update service must be activated and the API username and the API password must be set.

cancel_existing_orders.label: Cancel pending orders when out of stock
cancel_existing_orders.comment: If a product is in stock only once and the payment of the customer ordering this product fails or is aborted, it won't be available until the order is canceled (see timeout option below). Enable this setting to cancel the customer's pending orders when he returns to the cart page and a product is not available anymore. Be careful though: If you enable this option, there is a chance that payments are made with the corresponding order being already canceled.

wait_for_success.label: Wait On Success Page
wait_for_success.comment: In some cases the transaction requires a few seconds until it is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled the user is hold until the transaction reach the final state. If this is not the case in 30 seconds a message is shown to the customer, which explains the situation.

recurring.label: Recurring Payments
recurring.comment: If you would like to use recurring payments, you need our magento module "Customweb Subscription". For further information go to sellxed.com.

show_image.label: Show the payment image
show_image.comment: Show the payment image on the checkout page

show_payment_id.label: Show the payment id
show_payment_id.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

Currency.label: Currency
Currency.comment: Allowed currencies for this payment method

use_base_currency.label: Use base currency
use_base_currency.comment: Send amounts to Paybox in base currency.

settlement.label: Invoice settlement
settlement.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status

credit_card_brands.label: Credit Card Brands
credit_card_brands.comment: The brand of the credit card is detected by the card number if hidden authorization is used. If the payment page is used, the user has to select the brand. The allowed credit card brands can be restricted by this setting.

brand_selection.label: Image Brand Selection
brand_selection.comment: The card brand selection is automatically done depending on the entered card number. If no Javascript is active in the browser, a drop down is shown. In case JavaScript a the brand logos can be shown. Should the brand selection using images?

capturing.label: Capturing
capturing.comment: By setting the capturing the reservation can be captured directly after the order or later manually over the backend of the store. The difference between 'order' and 'authorization' is that on 'order' only a check is done, but not really a reservation on the card.

status_authorized.label: Authorized Status
status_authorized.comment: This status is set, when the payment was successfull and it is authorized.

status_uncertain.label: Uncertain Status
status_uncertain.comment: You can specify the order status for new orders that have an uncertain authorisation status.

status_captured.label: Captured Status
status_captured.comment: You can specify the order status for orders that are captured either directly after the order or manually in the backend.

authorizationMethod.label: Authorization Method
authorizationMethod.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

alias_manager.label: Alias Manager
alias_manager.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Paybox.

show_image.label: Show the payment image
show_image.comment: Show the payment image on the checkout page

show_payment_id.label: Show the payment id
show_payment_id.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

Currency.comment: Allowed currencies for this payment method

use_base_currency.comment: Send amounts to Paybox in base currency.

settlement.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status

authorizationMethod.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

alias_manager.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Paybox.
